meaningMnemonic: The <radical>tsunami</radical> hits your <radical>form</radical> and you begin to <kanji>melt</kanji>. You are a witch and water makes you melt. The tsunami is a lot of water, so once it touches your form, you begin to melt.
readingMnemonic: The only way to reverse the <kanji>melt</kanji> process is to eat some <reading>yo</reading>gurt (よう). The yogurt counteracts the melting from the water and your form will become whole again. Quick, eat some yogurt!
